title: Ex-Convict Teaches Bullied Kid To Fight | The Nail | Full Drama Hope Movie | Boxing Movie

sources.title: Ex-Convict Teaches Bullied Kid To Fight | The Nail | Full Drama Hope Movie | Boxing Movie
sources.description:
An over-the-hill, overweight ex-boxer and an abused young boy begin a relationship that gives them both a new and inspired life with a purpose: to only "fight for the right." This heartwarming story of two lost souls finding each other on the streets and boxing arenas of Philadelphia will capture your heart. The Nail is a story of forgiveness, hope and second chances.

2009.  Stars: William Forsythe, Tony Danza, Leo Rossi
